section_title: TWENTIETH SESSIONS OF THE SUBSIDIARY BODIES TO THE UNFCCC
sentences: At SB-20, held from 16-25 June 2004, in Bonn, Germany, the UNFCCCs SBSTA held two in-session workshops to advance discussions on the IPCC TAR findings.
The first workshop addressed the scientific, technical and socioeconomic aspects of impacts of, and vulnerability and adaptation to, climate change.
The second dealt with the scientific, technical and socioeconomic aspects of mitigation.
Parties then addressed these items in contact groups and adopted conclusions on each agenda item.
